name: Action Rickshaw
description:
Action Rickshaw is a racing/simulation game with three game modes

• Career
• Quick Race
• Free Roam

Career
Finish all the 80 races and get many upgrades for your rickshaw.

Quick Race
Choose your map, laps, difficulty and opponent numbers and play it your way.

Free Roam
Ride free in a large city and pick up passengers, drop them off and earn cash.
